title: New mod: Immersive Engineering
description: Technology mod that offers machines for automation, power generation... It works compatibly with Create.

title: New mod: Ultimate Car Mod
description: Adds cars, trucks and fuel to power them. You will need to build roads!

title: New mod: Ad-astra
description: Allows travel with a rocket to different planets, moons and space stations.
sublist: The Moon, Mars, Venus, Mercury and Glacio, in two different stelar systems
New machines, fuel and oxygen generation

title: New mod: MrCrayfish's Gun Mod
description: Adds new weapons to the game.
sublist: Pistol, Shotgun, Rifle, Grenade Launcher, Bazooka, Mini Gun, Assault Rifle, Machine Pistol and Heavy Rifle
Guns can be customized with different attachments (scopes, silencers, etc.)
Need ammunition and can be enchanted

title: New mod: MrCrayfish's Furniture Mod
description: Now you can decorate your house with new furniture.

title: New mod: Croptopia
description: Adds new crops, food and cooking mechanics.

title: New mod: Immersive Paintings
description: Put images from the internet or your computer into the game!

title: New mod: [Let's Do] Beachparty
description: Brings the beach to your world with new blocks, mobs and items.
sublist: Palm trees, sea stars and sandwaves to make the beach more realistic

title: New mod: Lightman's Currency
description: Adds money and economy to the game.
sublist: Copper, Iron, Gold, Diamond and Emerald coins
Bank accounts, ATM machines and wallets
Trading machines to sell your items
Slot machines. Yes, you can make a casino

title: New mod: Simple Planes
sublist: Small, large, cargo planes and helicopters
You can add boosters, TNT, shooters and solar panels to the vehicles
Engines can work with coal, lava, petroleum and redstone

title: New mod: Small Ships
description: Build ships and recruit a crew of villagers!
sublist: Adds variety of ships to sail the seas
Hire villagers for your crew, but also to farm, mine, fish and fight

title: New mod: Storage Drawers
description: Of course you don't have to store everything in big chests!

title: New mod: [Let's Do] Vinery
description: Adds wine and vineyards to the game.

title: Server upgrade: Cable Internet
description: Instead of wifi, my server now uses cable and has a 1 Gbps connection.
